Features #

  • âš¡ï¸ Vue 3, Vite 3, pnpm, ESBuild - born with fastness
  • ğŸ¦¾ TypeScript, of course

Install #

npm i scott-ui

Quick Start #

import Vue from 'vue'
import ScottUI from 'scott-ui'

const App = {
    template: `
        <SButton/>
    `,
};

createApp(App)
    .use(ScottUI)
    .mount("#app");

Browser Support #

Modern browsers and Internet Explorer 10+.
